articles.author: Vandana Ramnani
articles.title: DLF’s Privana South attracts NRIs from across the world, including Africa - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The response has been overwhelming and the project has been subscribed 4.5 times, said Aakash Ohri, Joint MD and Chief Business Officer, DLF Home Developers Ltd
articles.content: DLF said its newly launched luxury housing project Privana South in Gurugram generated sales of more than 7,200 crore in a matter of 72 hours, showing that its bet on a booming real estate segment in… [+3832 chars]
